name: grep
description: Search text for lines matching a regular expression pattern. Reads from standard input and prints each line that matches the given pattern. Supports extended regular expressions (-E), case-insensitive matching (-i), inverted matching (-v), line numbers (-n), and count-only mode (-c). Use for filtering log files, finding occurrences of a string, or extracting matching lines from any text stream.

input.description: Text to search through, provided on standard input. The first argument is the regular expression pattern.

output.description: Lines from the input that match the pattern, one per line. Returns nothing if no lines match.
